name: Angulotl Yegg
hp: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)
skills: Acrobatics +3 plus PB, Athletics +0 plus PB, Stealth +3 plus PB, Survival +2 plus PB

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The angulotl yegg can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Signature Attack (Poison Knife)
traits.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 plus PB piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. Beginning at 7th level, the yegg can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

traits.name: 3rd Level: Death from Above! (3/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the yegg jumps up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they leap over an enemy during this jump, the yegg can make a signature attack with advantage against that enemy. On a hit, this attack deals an extra PB piercing damage.

traits.name: 5th Level: Lay Low (3/Day)
traits.desc: When the yegg hits a creature with a signature attack while hidden, the yegg can use their reaction to remain hidden.

traits.name: 7th Level: Excoriating Acid (3/Day)
traits.desc: As an action, the yegg throws a flask of acid at a point they can see within 20 feet of them. The flask shatters, and each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 10 plus PB Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd10 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
